hero.name: Kingsley Kanu
hero.title: Full-Stack JS/TS Developer
hero.headline: Shipping resilient web platforms with modern TypeScript tooling.
hero.description: Engineer specialising in TypeScript-first product delivery, platform modernisation, and API-centric experiences for startups and enterprise teams across Europe.

about.title: Collaborative engineering leadership
about.summary: Kingsley is a pragmatic full-stack engineer with a product mindset, leading cross-functional squads from discovery to deployment. With a strong grasp of DevOps automation and UX collaboration, Kingsley builds systems that stay maintainable long after launch.

highlights.label: Location
highlights.value: Amsterdam, The Netherlands Â· Remote across EU & UK

skills.title: TypeScript-first delivery across the stack
skills.description: A toolkit tuned for rapid iteration, reliable releases, and strong developer experience across frontend and backend workflows.

projects.title: Production experience & live repositories
projects.description: Live GitHub work pulls straight into this portfolio. Flagship case studies highlight how Kingsley scales delivery with modern TypeScript, cloud, and automation.

flagship.title: AuthApp
flagship.summary: Authentication demo delivering JWT sessions, OAuth handshakes, and role-based access control for SaaS teams.

flagship.title: SyncSkilled
flagship.summary: Skills exchange marketplace connecting mentors and learners with credit based incentives and scheduling automation.

flagship.title: Portfolio Core
flagship.summary: This portfolio system featuring dynamic GitHub insights, SEO metadata, and Netlify Forms automation.

flagship.title: InvoiceLink Mini
flagship.summary: E-invoicing prototype integrating with FIRS APIs to manage compliance-ready invoice submissions.

flagship.title: QuickLinker (AI Project Generator)
flagship.summary: Generates starter codebases from product ideas using OpenAI Codex prompts and scaffolding pipelines.

flagship.title: API Visualizer
flagship.summary: Interactive console for exploring REST endpoints, caching responses, and sharing API snapshots with teams.

flagship.title: Form Validator Pro
flagship.summary: Reusable validation toolkit for complex form workflows exporting JSON rule sets and accessible error states.

contact.title: Ready to collaborate on your next release?
contact.summary: Drop a message with your goals, timeline, and tech stack. You will hear back within two business days with a kickoff slot or clarifying questions.

footer.summary: Built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. Deployed to the Netlify free tier.
